overview: A year in the making, Chi Chi LaRue's Rascal Video Production of Pillage and Plunder: The Movie is released. Filmed LIVE onboard the Pillage and Plunder cruise ship, 16 horny men in 5 sizzling scenes plus a 12 man "on deck" orgy fill this HOT new 2 hour video.
title: Pillage & Plunder: The Movie
